bill.summary:
Small Business Relief Accessibility Act
This bill requires the Small Business Administration (SBA) to establish a Community Navigator pilot program for increasing awareness of and participation in SBA programs that are made available to small businesses in response to COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019).
